class.name: ArithmeticException
class.javadoc:
Thrown when an exceptional arithmetic condition has occurred. For example, an integer "divide by zero" throws an instance of this class.{@code ArithmeticException} objects may be constructed by the virtual machine as if {@linkplain Throwable#Throwable(String,Throwable,boolean,boolean) suppression were disabled and/or the stack trace was not writable}.
unascribed
JDK1.0
Constructs an {@code ArithmeticException} with no detail message.

Constructs an {@code ArithmeticException} with the specified detail message.
s the detail message.
